basics.name: BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT EXECUTIVE
basics.label: Business Development Executive
basics.summary: Highly motivated and intelligent professional utilizing highly refined sales, marketing, and managerial skills to grow revenue and profits. Proficient with many software productivity suites like MS Office, and CRM tools like ACT!, Goldmine, and Salesforce.com.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Responsible for selling IT converged infrastructure consulting services, hardware and software solutions in the Greater Cincinnati area. My customer base includes companies such as Intelligrated, KAO, Great Oaks, Schulman, Hilltop Basic Resources, Luxottica, etc. Ranked #1 in account growth and new sales. Responsible for over 1 million dollars in revenue.
highlights: Added additional billing consultants in the first month representing 25% of the company revenue
